description: Base class for a resource (such as a feature). Resources should use AllOf to incorporate this class.

id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) used within the current server to identify the resource.

identifiers.description: Identifiers for the resource (see well-known/schemes... for example identity schemes).

links.description: Linked resources that are related to the current resource.

meta.description: Meta-data for the resource. Mandatory if you wish to support synchronisation.

name.description: A user-readable name for the resource.

resourceType.description: This MUST be populated with the name of the concrete type to support inheritance and deserialisation.

@self.description: Uniform resource identifier (URI) of the resource (rel=self).
